name: FakeDetector
short_description: A simple console program to battle fake naming and name flooding in p2p networks. Connects to a DirectConnect hub (adc and nmdc protocols supported) and scans it for known fake patterns. Also can parse hash indexes of StrongDC and FlylinkDC clients.
